--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

Dear Colleague, 

 

To ensure business continuity, we have scheduled essential maintenance to enhance the underlying infrastructure of the database systems for WMS and AIA.

 

Maintenance Schedule:
Date: Saturday, March 15, 2025 

Time: 10:00 PM â€“ 11:59 PM (GST)

 

Please be aware that during this period, access to Warehouse Application(WMS) and Oracle AIA will be temporarily unavailable.


We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to enhance your experience with our services.

 

If you require any assistance during this timeframe, please raise a support ticket via OneReach <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/> .
